Ingredients.4: 0.5 cup Karo® Light OR Dark Corn Syrup

Ingredients.7: 1 teaspoon Spice Islands® Pure Vanilla Extract

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C). Spray a large shallow roasting pan with cooking spray, then fill with popcorn.

Directions.2: Place in the preheated oven while preparing caramel.

Directions.3: Mix brown sugar, corn syrup, butter, and salt together in a heavy 2-quart saucepan over medium heat; stir constantly until mixture comes to a boil.

Directions.4: Stop stirring, and boil mixture for 5 minutes.

Directions.5: Remove from the heat and stir in baking soda and vanilla until well combined.

Directions.6: Pour syrup over warmed popcorn and stir until evenly coated.

Directions.7: Return to the oven and bake for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally.

Directions.8: Remove from the oven and spread onto a large foil sheet greased with cooking spray.

Directions.9: Cool, then break apart and store in a tightly covered container.
